CustomField.formula: IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 1, "Januari " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 2, "Februari " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 3, "Maret " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 4, "April " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 5, "Mei " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 6, "Juni " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 7, "Juli " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 8, "Agustus " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 9, "September " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 10, "Oktober " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 11, "November " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), IF (MONTH(Date__c) == 12, "Desember " & TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)), NULL))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Periode
